intro: Yinshania lichuanensis, commonly known as the Lichuan yinshania, is a flowering plant native to China. It belongs to the family Rubiaceae, which includes coffee and gardenias. The plant is characterized by its small, clustered flowers and lance-shaped leaves. It thrives in shaded, moist environments, typically found in mountainous regions. Due to its limited distribution, it is considered a rare and potentially endangered species.
